channel.title: R on Tony Duan
channel.description: Recent content in R on Tony Duan

item.title: What's new on Rstudio 1.2
item.description: Rstudio 1.2 The RStudio 1.2 Preview Release,available at 2018-10-02. 1.New Rstudio logo (Rstudio 1.2) (Rstudio 1.1) 2.Not longer support 32-bit base R (Rstudio 1.2 only support 64-bit base R) (Rstudio 1.1 can choose 32-bit or 64 bit base R) 3.Python support 1.Support line-by-line execution of Python code 2.When working on Rmarkdwon ,1.2 now able to call python variable on R environment or call R variable on python environment
